content: sunflower lovers granny square a crochet pattern by cornwall crochet materials -yarn approximately 27m/30 yds of aran weight yarn i used a total of 18g yarn & colors epic 100 %cotton 75m/82ydsper 50g in fourcolours with yarn quantities as below yarn a brunet -approx3g 4 5m/5yds yarn b clay - approx3g 4 5m/5yds yarn c sunflower -approx6g 9m/10yds yarn d petroleum -approx6g 9m/10yds -hook 5mm hook or size required to achieve gauge this pattern would also work well if you prefer to use adifferent yarn weight orfibre use an appropriate hook size for your yarn yarn band will give guidance this willalter featuringan eye-catching sunflower motif this granny your square s finished size square uses a combination of textured stitches to create a realistic flower design which can be used for a wide finished size variety of accessories from coasters and bags to completed granny square measures approximately 13cm x blanketsand beyond with phototutorials for the less 13cm 5 ½ x 5 ½ familiar stitches this pattern is suitable for allexperience levels from confident beginners up enjoy © cornwall crochet 2023 cornwallcrochet@gmail com page 1 sunflower lovers granny square a crochet pattern by cornwall crochet abbreviations gauge this pattern is written in u s crochet terminology rounds 1-3 give a circle measuring 5cm/2 diameter a gauge swatch using double_crochet would give chain chain 13stitches & 6 5 row in 10cm x 10cm 4 x 4 square magic_ring magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch notes st s - stitch es beginning ch1 does not count as stitch beginning ch3 space s - space s counts as a double_crochet beginning ch4 counts as a tc skip - skip single_crochet single_crochet stitches in parentheses are worked into same st esc extended single_crochet parentheses also indicate stitch counts atend of double_crochet double_crochet row fpdc front post double_crochet tc treble_crochet stitches in brackets indicate sections which are mp mini puff repeated dc4tog double_crochet 4 together dc5tog double_crochet 5 together photos are included in two places in this pattern thoseintegrated with the pattern text illustrate extra guidance for esc mp and dc4 or5 decrease stitches is stitch placement additional photos are added at the given in stitch tutorials from page 6onwards end of the pattern in stitch tutorials providing extra guidancefor stitches that may be less familiar © cornwall crochet 2023 cornwallcrochet@gmail com page 2 sunflower lovers granny square a crochet pattern by cornwall crochet round 1 using yarn a work ch3 and 7 double_crochet into a magic_ring slip_stitch to top of ch3 to join 8 double_crochet round 2 continuing in yarn a ch1 and work single_crochet ch1 in each space between double_crochet from round 1 slip_stitch to top of first single_crochet to join 8 single_crochet 8 chain round 3 still using yarn a ch3 then work 1 fpdc around first double_crochet from round 1 drawing up stitch to same height as the beginning ch3 skip ch1 space from round 2 then in next single_crochet work 1 double_crochet work 1 fpdc around next double_crochet from round 1 7 times
